name: Sine Chaser - Channel 2
description:
"Why is it that everyone we've met has tried to kill us since we got this Crystal?"

"Dunno, it's probably cursed. But at least things aren't boring!"

STORY

In their last adventure, Chill Azure and Jill Lagata (she's you) defeated the Ghost Bosses of Evershade Castle, and completed their quest to find the legendary Wave Crystal. Unfortunately, that's put them squarely in the crosshairs of Lady Vanati and her army of gimmicky robots, who want the Crystal's powers for themselves

Upon returning to Melodia Capital City to deliver the Crystal to the museum, it is mysteriously stolen by a new foe called Tellebon. In order to get it back, Lagata must fight through hoards of robots, monsters and cops, and unravel the mysteries of Tellebon's super secret ability!

THE GAME ITSELF

Sine Chaser is a fast-paced 2D platformer, pulling inspiration from classic games from the 16-bit era. Run and jump through four unique stages as you fight your way through the urban jungle of Melodia Capital

  • Four Dynamic Stages
  • Classic Run'n'Jump Platforming 
  • Unique, Challenging Boss Fight
  • Interact with Characters to solve the Mystery
  • 90s Dance-inspired Soundtrack
  • Finish it in one sitting!

Chapter Two is available for free!
